assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Developing skills on one's main instrument through the practice of technical exercises and the study of the mandatory repertoire. Transcribing and sight-reading.
description.et: Instrumendi valdamise arendamine tehniliste harjutuste ja repertuaari toel. Transkribeerimine ja noodistlugemine.

objectives.en: The course aims at developing a good sound quality, and finding one's idiosyncratic playing style on the main instrument.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on hea kõlakvaliteedi arendamine ja isikupärase mängustiili kujundamine põhipillil.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon completion the course the students:
* are able to perform the first year mandatory repertoire;
learning_outcomes.et: * oskab esitada II kursuse kohustuslikku repertuaari,

learning_outcomes.en: * know the basic modes (2nd year requirements),
learning_outcomes.et: * tunneb põhilaade, suudab neid esitada vastavalt tehnilise arvestuse nõuetele,

learning_outcomes.en: * analyze different interpretations (based on transcribed material)
* will have acquired knowledge in combining different styles, based on personal experience.
learning_outcomes.et: * omandab isikliku kogemuse põhjal teadmisi stiilide sünteesimisest (pärimus ja jazz)
